functions.name: STARTS_WITH
functions.description: Check if string starts with prefix

functions.name: ENDS_WITH
functions.description: Check if string ends with suffix

functions.name: PAD_LEFT
functions.description: Pad string from left. Alias: LPAD

functions.name: PAD_RIGHT
functions.description: Pad string from right. Alias: RPAD

functions.name: TITLE_CASE
functions.description: Title case all words. Alias: INITCAP

functions.name: SUBSTITUTE
functions.description: Replaces occurrences of search with replace

functions.name: CONTAINS
functions.description: Checks if search string is in text

functions.name: REGEX_TEST
functions.description: Tests if string matches regex. Alias: REGEX_MATCH

functions.name: REGEX_REPLACE
functions.description: Replace occurrences of a pattern in a string

functions.name: FUZZY_MATCH
functions.description: Returns true if text matches pattern within edit distance

functions.name: SOUNDEX
functions.description: Returns phonetic code for name matching

functions.name: METAPHONE
functions.description: Returns phonetic encoding using Metaphone algorithm

functions.name: DOUBLE_METAPHONE
functions.description: Returns array with [primary, secondary] phonetic codes

functions.name: COLOGNE
functions.description: Cologne Phonetic algorithm for German names

functions.name: NYSIIS
functions.description: New York State algorithm for various ethnic origins

functions.name: SLUGIFY
functions.description: Converts text to a URL-friendly slug

functions.name: RANDOM
functions.description: Returns a random float between 0 and 1

functions.name: EXP
functions.description: Returns e raised to the power of x

functions.name: DEG
functions.description: Convert radians to degrees (alias for DEGREES)

functions.name: RAD
functions.description: Convert degrees to radians (alias for RADIANS)

functions.name: SUM
functions.description: Sum of all values in the array

functions.name: COUNT
functions.description: Number of elements in the array

functions.name: SLICE
functions.description: Extracts a portion of the array

functions.name: COLLECTION_COUNT
functions.description: Returns the number of documents in a collection

functions.name: INDEX_OF
functions.description: Returns index of value, or -1 if not found

functions.name: DROP
functions.description: Returns array without first n elements. Alias: SKIP

functions.name: CHUNK
functions.description: Splits array into chunks of specified size

functions.name: SORTED
functions.description: Sorts the array in ascending order

functions.name: PUSH
functions.description: Appends an element to the array

functions.name: MINUS
functions.description: Returns elements in arr1 not in arr2

functions.name: ZIP
functions.description: Zips two arrays into an array of pairs

functions.name: REMOVE_VALUE
functions.description: Removes all occurrences of value from array

functions.name: POSITION
functions.description: Returns 0-based index if element exists, -1 otherwise

functions.name: CONTAINS_ARRAY
functions.description: Returns true if array contains element

functions.name: HUMAN_TIME
functions.description: Converts date to relative human-readable string

functions.name: DATE_FORMAT
functions.description: Formats date according to format string (strftime-style)

functions.name: DATE_ADD
functions.description: Add a specified amount of time to a date

functions.name: DATE_SUBTRACT
functions.description: Subtract a specified amount of time from a date

functions.name: DATE_DIFF
functions.description: Calculate the difference between two dates
functions.signature: DATE_DIFF(date1, date2, unit, asFloat?, tz1?, tz2?)

functions.name: TIME_BUCKET
functions.description: Buckets timestamp into fixed intervals for time series aggregation

functions.name: HIGHLIGHT
functions.description: Wraps matching terms in text with bold tags

functions.name: DISTANCE
functions.description: Calculates distance in meters between two coordinate pairs using Haversine formula

functions.name: GEO_DISTANCE
functions.description: Distance in meters between GeoPoint objects

functions.name: GEO_WITHIN
functions.description: Returns true if point is inside the specified polygon

functions.name: VECTOR_SIMILARITY
functions.description: Calculates cosine similarity between two vectors

functions.name: VECTOR_DISTANCE
functions.description: Calculates the distance between two vectors using specified metric

functions.name: VECTOR_NORMALIZE
functions.description: Normalizes a vector to unit length

functions.name: VECTOR_INDEX_STATS
functions.description: Returns statistics about a vector index

functions.name: FULLTEXT
functions.description: N-Gram fulltext search with fuzzy matching

functions.name: BM25
functions.description: BM25 relevance scoring for ranking search results

functions.name: HYBRID_SEARCH
functions.description: Combines vector similarity search with fulltext search
functions.signature: HYBRID_SEARCH(collection, vector_index, fulltext_field, query_vector, text_query, options?)

functions.name: SAMPLE
functions.description: Returns a random sample of documents from a collection

functions.name: ARGON2_HASH
functions.description: Securely hash a password using Argon2id

functions.name: ARGON2_VERIFY
functions.description: Verify a password against a stored Argon2 hash

functions.name: BASE64_DECODE
functions.description: Decode Base64 string back to original

functions.name: IS_ARRAY
functions.description: Returns true if value is an array

functions.name: IS_BOOLEAN
functions.description: Returns true if value is a boolean

functions.name: IS_NUMBER
functions.description: Returns true if value is a number

functions.name: IS_INTEGER
functions.description: Returns true if value is an integer

functions.name: IS_STRING
functions.description: Returns true if value is a string

functions.name: IS_OBJECT
functions.description: Returns true if value is an object

functions.name: IS_NULL
functions.description: Returns true if value is null

functions.name: IS_DATETIME
functions.description: Returns true if value is an ISO 8601 date string

functions.name: TYPENAME
functions.description: Returns the type name as a string

functions.name: IS_EMAIL
functions.description: Returns true if value is a valid email format

functions.name: IS_URL
functions.description: Returns true if value is a valid URL format

functions.name: IS_UUID
functions.description: Returns true if value is a valid UUID format

functions.name: IS_EMPTY
functions.description: Returns true if value is null, empty string, empty array, or empty object

functions.name: IS_BLANK
functions.description: Returns true if string is blank (whitespace only)

functions.name: IF
functions.description: Condition evaluation. Returns true_val if cond is true, else false_val

functions.name: COALESCE
functions.description: Returns the first non-null value. Alias: NOT_NULL

functions.name: NULLIF
functions.description: Returns null if expr1 equals expr2, otherwise returns expr1

functions.name: GET
functions.description: Get nested value by dot-notation path

functions.name: ATTRIBUTES
functions.description: Top-level attribute keys of the document

functions.name: UUID
functions.description: Generates a random UUID v4. Alias: UUID_V4

functions.name: COLLECT_LIST
functions.description: Aggregates values from the group into an array

functions.name: SHORTEST_PATH
functions.description: Find the shortest path between two vertices in a graph
functions.signature: SHORTEST_PATH start TO end direction edgeCollection

operators.description: Null coalesce - returns left if not null
Logical OR (falsy coalesce) - returns left if truthy

operators.name: ANY
operators.description: True if one or more elements satisfy the condition

operators.name: ALL
operators.description: True if every element satisfies the condition

operators.name: NONE
operators.description: True if zero elements satisfy the condition
Pipeline operator - chains function calls, passing left value as first argument to right function

keywords.name: LET
keywords.description: Bind values or subquery results to variables

keywords.name: WITH
keywords.description: Specify collection dependencies or aggregation context

keywords.name: OUTBOUND
keywords.description: Follow outgoing edges in graph traversal (_from -> _to)

keywords.name: INBOUND
keywords.description: Follow incoming edges in graph traversal (_to <- _from)

keywords.name: LEFT JOIN
keywords.description: Left outer join with another collection

keywords.name: RIGHT JOIN
keywords.description: Right outer join with another collection

keywords.name: FULL OUTER JOIN
keywords.description: Full outer join with another collection

keywords.name: ROW_NUMBER
keywords.description: Window function for sequential row numbers

keywords.name: RANK
keywords.description: Window function for ranking with gaps

keywords.name: DENSE_RANK
keywords.description: Window function for ranking without gaps

keywords.name: LAG
keywords.description: Window function to access previous row value

keywords.name: LEAD
keywords.description: Window function to access next row value

keywords.name: FIRST_VALUE
keywords.description: Window function for first value in partition

keywords.name: LAST_VALUE
keywords.description: Window function for last value in partition

keywords.name: NEW
keywords.description: Reference to document state after modification

keywords.name: OLD
keywords.description: Reference to document state before modification
